manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get your friends and family in on the fun! This wired USB microphone features Wide-Frequency Response and High Sensitivity to add the power to your power-house performances!
The13ft USB wired microphone compatible with PS4 Slim, PS4 Pro, PS4, PS5, Xbox Series S, Xbox Series X, Xbox One, Switch, Wii, Wii U, Xbox 360, PS2, PS3, PC, etc

Rugged and Comfortable: Made of high quality materials, this handheld microphone is solid, rugged and durable. It feels comfortable when you grap it in your hand. You will be glad to move freely as the attached cable is around 13ft long, no need to worry the loose of the connector or the length of the cable.

We tested most games on these systems. The following is the testing results of the games for reference. » PC: For Rock Band 1, Guitar Hero 5. »PS2: For Guitar Hero World Tour, Guitar Hero Encore: Rocks the 80s, Guitar Hero Smash Hits, Guitar Hero Aerosmith, Guitar Hero Metallica, Guitar Hero Van Halen, Rock Band 2,Rock Band, LEGO Rock Band, Rock Band 1, Guitar Hero 5. » PS3:For Guitar Hero World Tour, Guitar Hero Encore: Rocks the 80s, Guitar Hero Smash Hits, Guitar Hero Aerosmith, Guitar Hero Metallica, Guitar Hero Van Halen, Rock Band 2, Rock Band, LEGO Rock Band, Rock Band 1, Guitar Hero . » Xbox 360: For Guitar Hero World Tour, Guitar Hero Encore: Rocks the 80s, Guitar Hero Smash Hits, Guitar Hero Aerosmith , Guitar Hero Metallica, Guitar Hero Van Halen, Rock Band 2, Rock Band, LEGO Rock Band, Rock Band 1, Guitar Hero 5, Lips: I Love The 80s. » Wii: For Guitar Hero World Tour, Guitar Hero Encore: Rocks the 80s, Guitar Hero Smash Hits, Guitar Hero Aerosmith, Guitar Hero Metallica, Guitar Hero Van Halen, Rock Band 2, Rock Band, LEGO Rock Band, Rock Band 1, Guitar Hero 5, Boogie Superstar, U-sing, Grease, Robbie Williams, Glee, SingStar, We Sing Robbie Williams, Karaoke Joysound, American Idol Encore, Def Jam Rapstar, Karaoke Revolution, Sing It, Joysound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Plug and play Microphone
reviews.reviewText: Use this device for Xbox 1 s works with no issues on rock band 4

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Match for Let's Sing on PS5 – Drimoor USB Microphones
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Drimoor 2Pack 13ft Wired USB Microphones for use with the Let's Sing series on my PS5, and I've been thoroughly impressed with their performance.Exceptional Compatibility with PS5: These microphones were incredibly easy to set up with my PlayStation 5. They were recognized instantly by the console, and I experienced no compatibility issues. This plug-and-play convenience is a huge plus, especially when you’re eager to jump into a game.Crystal Clear Sound Quality: The sound quality of these microphones is top-notch. They capture vocals clearly and accurately, which is essential for a game like Let's Sing. Whether hitting high notes or maintaining pitch, these microphones didn't miss a beat. The audio feedback is so crisp and clear that it enhances the overall gaming experience.Perfect for Multiplayer: Having two microphones has made multiplayer sessions a blast. The length of the cords is just right, allowing for comfortable movement without getting tangled. This is especially great when playing with friends or family, as it gives everyone enough space to enjoy the game fully.Durable and Well-Made: The build quality of these microphones is impressive. They feel sturdy and well-constructed, which gives me confidence that they will last for many gaming sessions to come. The durability is a significant factor, especially considering the energetic nature of music games.Great Value for the Price: For the quality and functionality these microphones offer, the price is unbeatable. It's a great value, especially for those who are regular players of singing games like the Let's Sing series.Conclusion: Overall, the Drimoor 2Pack 13ft Wired USB Microphones are a fantastic purchase for anyone who enjoys the Let's Sing series on PS5. They deliver on sound quality, ease of use, and durability, all while being affordably priced. These microphones have definitely enhanced my gaming experience, and I highly recommend them to other Let's Sing enthusiasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plug and play
reviews.reviewText: Plugged into the ps5 and worked immediately with just sing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used with Karaoke JoySound
reviews.reviewText: I was concerned about whether these would work okay with Karaoke JoySound on the Japanese eShop. However, there's no delay, and work instantly on plug-in. The mics are surprisingly well constructed, and the cables are long enough to accommodate the room.Audio quality is also good for karaoke and they pick up just your voice well, but don't expect to be using these for podcasting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working within a week
reviews.reviewText: Got these microphones to use with Rock Band 3 which we gave to our kids for Christmas this year. They seemed to work great… for a week. Today one of them randomly stopped working. We verified that it wasn’t an issue with the port on the Xbox as the other mic worked fine plugged into it. We also tried plugging the dead one into other ports but got nothing from it - just completely unresponsive while the other one stiff functions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works if nothing else
reviews.reviewText: Worked without any difficulty. But sound quality isnt that great, voice seems soft and then if you.move your mouth closer it has a slight tinny distortion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for xbox one/series X
reviews.reviewText: This is a great deal for 2 microphone 🎤 considering how increasingly hard it is to get Rockband instruments. Yes Rockband does work with headsets including wireless ones now, but do you really want a 4 year old controlling the volume going into their ears. I place this on a mic stand and it becomes a stationary device that is adjusted for each kids height.
